attributes.action: create an 'other' category on forms where sex/gender information is requested
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many people now feel uncomfortable disclosing their gender or sex when it is not strictly necessary. This is not only problematic for the transexual, transgendered, intersexed, genderqueer and other gender non-normative people but also for people who simply do not wish to disclose their gender.
There are very few places where gender/sex is necessary to know and this would save a lot of people a lot of embarrassment and be a relief to those of us who never know the right box to tick.
